MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL55 postcode area of Llanrug, affecting properties in Glan Moelyn, Hermon Terrace and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:48AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of damaged overhead line equipment and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midday today. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09:59AM on 23rd February 2021
